ISSUE.TITLE: Datasources and members recently added to a group dissapear when tab is changed
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: This happens when you add a datasource to a group, then change tab to members. When you get back to datasources, the list with them is empty (but it's actually added). If you refresh the tab, the datasource appears. The same happens with members.
